Articles.Content: I captured a class E asteroid(HUGE) and placed it in stable orbit around kerbin but I have yet to get a pop up saying mission completed or something. Does anything happen or is the update called asteroid redirect mission just cause it has asteroids?

You get a gold star, well done.

Yeah, I don't think there's any achievement or anything. You might get a steam trading card or something for it, not sure.
KSP doesn't have an "missions" at the moment, so congratulations!

heres a mod I found that you can use until they add them into the game, I think (im not 100% sure) there gonna add more things into career mode like contracts (missions) and budgets in the 0.24 update

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52535-0-23-0-Achievements-1-5-5-Earn-132-achievements-while-playing
